sentences.en: A brief review of factors leading to the formulation of this concept follows.
sentences.cn: 下面我们将提出导致形成这种概念的一些因素,并加以简短评述.

sentences.en: His formulation is gravely lacking in mathematical rigour.
sentences.cn: 他的公式严重缺乏数学上的严密性.

sentences.en: In order to optimize the process, formulation of objective function is necessary.
sentences.cn: 为了使过程最优化, 目标函数的公式是必不可少的.

sentences.en: In the next section we present another formulation ( simpler ) in terms of stresses.
sentences.cn: 在下一节中,我们给出另一种 ( 较简单的 ) 利用胁强的表述.

sentences.en: It's a vague formulation that leaves much to the discretion of local authorities.
sentences.cn: 这只是个模糊的构想，许多方面还要由地方当局来定夺。

sentences.en: Persistence of the herbicide in the mud was irrespective of formulation.
sentences.cn: 除草剂在底泥中的持久性与剂型无关.

sentences.en: The formulation is complete in the sense that there are a sufficient number of equations.
sentences.cn: 方程的个数是足够的. 在这个意义下,问题的提法是完整的.

sentences.en: The mathematical formulation of this hypothesis is a persuasive one.
sentences.cn: 这一假设的数学形式是诱人的.

sentences.en: The most common formulation of the message content in banking is rational appeal.
sentences.cn: 银行广告内容的最一般规律是要有理性的说服力.

sentences.en: There have been problems with the formulation of the vaccine.
These concepts were firmly entrenched in the mathematical formulation of classical mechanics.
sentences.cn: 这些概念在经典力学的数学表述中根深蒂固.

sentences.en: This is a far weaker formulation than is in the draft resolution which is being proposed.
sentences.cn: 这种表述比所提决议草案中的说法要弱很多。

sentences.en: You can buy a formulation containing royal jelly, pollen and vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 可以买一种含蜂王浆、花粉和维生素C的配方产品。

words.tran_cn: 公式化的；刻板的；套话堆砌的

trans.tran_en: the way in which you express your thoughts and ideas
